entry.title: post
entry.content:
数学一轮总结（一）

级数

常数项级数

判敛准则:

  • 比值判别法: $\lim\limits_{n \to \infty}\frac {u_{n+1} }{ {u_{n}} }=\rho$
  • 根值判别法 $\lim\limits_{n \to \infty}\sqrt{u_{n} }=\rho$

$$ \sum_{n=1}^\infty u_n

\begin{cases}

收敛,\rho < 1
\发散,\rho > 1
\不确定, \rho = 1

\end{cases} $$

交错级数

判敛准则:
- 递减极限为1

幂级数

  1. 收敛半径 $R = \frac{1}{\rho}$
  2. 函数的幂级数展开
    $$
    \frac {1}{1-x} = \sum_{n = 0}^{\infty} x^n
    \ \frac {1}{1+x} = \sum_{n = 0}^{\infty} (-x)^n
    \ e^{x} = \sum_{n = 0}^{\infty} \frac {x^n} {n!}
    \ \sin x = \sum_{n = 0}^{\infty} (-1)^{n} \frac {x^{2n+1}}{(2n+1)!}
    \ \cos x = \sum_{n = 0}^{\infty} (-1)^{n} \frac {x^{2n}}{(2n)!}
    \ \ln (1+x) = \sum_{n = 0}^{\infty} (-1)^{n} \frac {x^{n+1} }{(n+1)!}
    $$
